scripts.start: rimraf serve && npm run electron:build:serve && concurrently "npm run ng:watch:dev" "electron . --serve"
scripts.start:prod: rimraf serve && npm run electron:build:serve && concurrently "npm run ng:watch:prod" "electron . --serve"
scripts.build: npm run ng:build:prod && npm run electron:build:dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run ng:build:dev && npm run electron:build:dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build
scripts.dist:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build
scripts.dist:windows:32: cross-env ARCH=ia32 PLATFORM=win32 npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build --windows --ia32
scripts.dist:windows:64: cross-env ARCH=x64 PLATFORM=win32 npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build --windows --x64
scripts.dist:linux:32: cross-env ARCH=ia32 PLATFORM=linux npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build --linux --ia32
scripts.dist:linux:64: cross-env ARCH=x64 PLATFORM=linux npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build --linux --x64
scripts.dist:osx: cross-env ARCH=x64 PLATFORM=mac npm run build && npm run clean-build && npx electron-builder build --mac
